transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir good morning Vanshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Boliye. Sir actually aapka sir ek sir leads regarding ke liye maine connect kiya tha sir. Sir maine aapse us din bhi bola tha Friday ke liye aapne bola tha 5 baje connect karne ke liye but aapne call receive nahi ki thi.
Executive: Sir leads regarding ke liye kiya tha sir leads consume karna tha sir. Feedback aaya tha na sir leads ki wajah se.
Customer: [inaudible] WhatsApp number de deta hu ek vyakti ko.
Customer: Theek hai? Aap unse connect kar lena.
Customer: WhatsApp number deta hu.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Woh aapko bata denge.
Executive: Sir aapme sir koi person hire kar lijiye sir aapke sir messages manage karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan haan kar rakha hai.
Executive: Main usko phir guide kar dungi sir kaise kya use karna hai seller panel IndiaMART ka sir hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe number bhej dijiye woh call abhi receive kar lenge?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Sir main bol rahi hu aap mujhe unka number de dijiye woh call abhi receive kar lenge?
Customer: Haan sir nahi receive karenge.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap number de dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Kya WhatsApp kar do.
Executive: WhatsApp par rehte hai.
Executive: WhatsApp kar rahe hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir maine aapko message kiya hai sir dekh lijiye.
Customer: Karta hu main.
Executive: Sir abhi sir dijiye sir mujhe concern choose karna hai na sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir dijiye sir do do hafte se sir open hai sir aap khud dekho na sir. Agar sir mujhe pareshan hi karna hota toh sir main aapko phir baar baar nahi call karti sir.
Executive: Thik hai usme multiple lead kharab hoti hai na toh iske liye phir aapko koi decision lena padega.
Executive: Isse na phir aap aapke taraf se jo kabhi kabhi ho jayega logo ko bhi aap kaam nahi kar payenge.
Executive: Hai na.
Executive: Baki sir aap owner ho company matlab IndiaMART ke services chal rahe hai iske owner hai sir aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir main ye puch rahi hu aap owner ho?
Customer: Bilkul sir. Aapko woh lagta hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main puch rahi hu sir basically isme do number hai na isme do number hai na sir isiliye main bol rahi hu sir.
Customer: Achha dono owner hi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main puch rahi hu ye jo number hai last mein 626 hai woh owner ka matlab aap owner ho services de rahe hai.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Sir main ye puch rahi hu jo last mein 626 wala jo number hai na jisme abhi main call kar rahi hu baat kar rahi hu ye matlab aapka owner naam hai Krishna ke naam hai aapka?
Customer: Aur bataiye toh main apne number se na aapko.
Executive: Konsa 626 kya?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai?
Executive: Sir main ye bol rahi hu jo last mein unke number hai 626 wala 9860079626 wala sir. Ye matlab aapka number hai owner hai aap company ke main ye puch rahi hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir sir abhi kuch business sir abhi convert hua hai itne time se sir aapko ek month ho gaya IndiaMART mein toh kuch conversion hua hai sir abhi tak mein.
Customer: Haan bhai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hmm karta hu main aapko call.
Customer: Bhej deta hu. Sir number toh sir number de deta hu na madam.
Executive: Sir main business ke liye aapko puch rahi hu agar kuch dikkat aa rahi hai leads vagaira pe agar conversion nahi ho raha hai toh sir ek baar bataiye main aapko leads kuch forward kar du WhatsApp mein aapke number pe.
Customer: Abhi main khana kha raha hu khana khana kha raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai. Sir khana.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Khana toh khane do mujhe.
Executive: Sir number toh bhej dijiye na sir main phir aapko call bhi karungi disturb nahi karungi na sir aapko isi baar mein ye bol rahi hu. Sir aap aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive call on Friday.

- Wants to know about business conversion.



Resolution:

- Executive asked about hiring a person to manage messages.

- Executive offered to guide on using seller panel.

- Executive offered to forward leads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to receive WhatsApp number from customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, follow up, business conversion, whatsapp
